name: Clan Of Cats
description:
If you love the idea of playing as a cat warrior while surviving against wild animals, this game is what you have been looking for. Part adventure and part simulation, this cat simulator will take you on an epic journey as you build your warrior clan, use your magic, build your home, defend against enemies that attack, and ultimately defeat all the Super Bosses. Huge open world style game.

Features:
**6 Giant bosses
**4 Enemy Cat Warrior Clans to defeat
**4 Super Bosses
**4 Magic Spells - Fireball, Invincibility, Lightning Bolt, and Healing
**Massive 3D Open World Map
**Caves, Mountains, and Rivers
**Crocodile, Bears, Lions, Goats, Snakes, Eagles, Foxes
**Dynamic weather including snow and rain storms

The story begins by you finding all the members of your clan. You Build your clan Call the members when you need help against the enemies. Bosses include Giant Goat, Lion, Bear, Crocodile, Attack eagles, Foxes, and Snakes.

Find the magic spell books to unlock the special magical spells including: Fireball, Lightning Bolt, Healing Potion, and Invincibility. Earn adventure points by hunting and doing various tasks to upgrade and purchase magic.

Build your warriors and use them to defend your territory against other clans. There are 4 other enemy clans : Mountain Clan, Ultimate Shadow Clan, Short Hairs, Grey Beards.


The wise spirit animal will offer you real valuable advice about how to be more successful.

Upgrade your powers to become more powerful, have stronger defense, and have stronger magical ability.

This is animal simulation like you have never seen it. Your favorite fantasy elements combined with animal simulation.

Evolved is a new series of games we are creating at Wild Foot. We would really like to hear from you. Come and stop by our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames for updates.  Be sure and check out our other 3D animal simulators. We understand that the game is by no means perfect and we welcome your constructive criticism. Please email your suggestions. Good luck now grow your cat clan!
